description: Take advantage of ready-made slow-cooked brisket with this quick and easy beef brisket recipe. Heat, shred and serve for a tasty, no-fuss midweek dinner.
name: Easy Beef Brisket Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 700g Woolworths COOK slow cooked beef brisket
0.25 cup Sweet Baby Rayâ€™s barbecue sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Half-fill a medium saucepan with water. Bring to the boil over high heat. Remove brisket from cardboard box and carefully place the sealed brisket in the water, reserving sauce sachet. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, for 12 minutes or until warmed through.

Carefully remove brisket from water and open plastic packaging, discarding any cooking juices from brisket. Place in a heatproof bowl and, using two forks, roughly shred meat. Drizzle sauce from reserved sachet over meat and toss to coat.
Make slaw according to packet instructions. Season with pepper.
Place a little slaw on roll bases. Top with brisket and barbecue sauce. Sandwich with roll tops. Serve with remaining slaw.
